title.rendered: Papua New Guinea vs Nepal, World Cup League 2: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

PNG: Tony Ura, Lega Siaka, Sese Bau, Assad Vala (c), Kiplin Doriga (wk), Gaudi Toka, Charles Amini, Riley Hekure, Hiri Hiri, Kabua Morea/Alei Nao, Norman Vanua

Nepal: Aasif Sheikh (wk), Kushal Bhurtel, Gyanendra Malla, Rohit Paudel (c), Kushal Malla, Sundeep Jora, Dipendra Singh Airee, Sompal Kami, Karan KC, Lalit Rajbanshi, Gulshan Jha

Venue: Dubai International Cricket Stadium, Dubai

Pitch Report

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 263

2nd innings average score: 194

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 66%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Rohit Paudel (392 at 78) and Dipendra Singh Airee (138 at 33) are the highest run-getters for Nepal against PNG. Moreover, both have registered a century each.

In only two innings against PNG, Karan KC has added 71 runs, including the highest score of 42. He has also hit the second-most sixes (6) against them.

From the current squad, Sompal Kami (12) is the leading wicket-taker for Nepal versus PNG. His best effort reads 3 for 38.

Lega Siaka (169) and Assad Vala (129) have scored the most runs for PNG against Nepal. While Saika has the highest score of 90, Vala’s best score reads 60.

Norman Vanua and Charles Amini have collectively bagged 16 wickets against Nepal and 9 wickets in Dubai.

Aasif Sheikh has managed only 51 runs and one dismissal with the gloves in four ODIs against PNG.
